TopicTitle: Craft started spinning after returning to 1x time

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Home 64-bit (10.0, Build 22621) | CPU: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12400F (12 CPUs), ~2.5GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 | RAM: 16384 MB

 

I was time-warping while being in LKO and when I stopped the warp my vehicle randomly started spinning in presumably random direction fast. It doesnt happen all the times

 

Edited July 8, 2023 by Anth12

In my experience this happens primarily when a vessel has landing legs - the same issue arises without timewarp when landing legs are deployed in orbit, and gets worse when physicsless timewarping close to a planet/moon.
